backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to relevant frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text summaries of key frontend files including App, modal component, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables for light/dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main storefront page with image gallery, product details, and Buy Now modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/CashAppInstructi: Modal showing Cash App payment steps with copy-to-clipboard support and Escape-to-close.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth state, login, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styling defining monochrome streetwear theme for light/dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing providers and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, spacing, typography, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state for a single-product storefront with Cash App payment instructions, including features, issues, and metadata.
